title: Slideshow: Chemical Industry Products to Watch - September 2025

title_detail.value: Slideshow: Chemical Industry Products to Watch - September 2025

summary: This month’s roundup highlights technologies designed to improve efficiency, precision and reliability across industrial operations. Featured products include advanced weighing indicators and floor scales for demanding environments, a benchtop synthesizer for high-throughput peptide production, pleated filter bags with extended dirt-holding capacity, a temperature transmitter with enhanced accuracy and diagnostics, and a connected pulse controller for dust collectors that enables real-time performance monitoring.

summary_detail.value: This month’s roundup highlights technologies designed to improve efficiency, precision and reliability across industrial operations. Featured products include advanced weighing indicators and floor scales for demanding environments, a benchtop synthesizer for high-throughput peptide production, pleated filter bags with extended dirt-holding capacity, a temperature transmitter with enhanced accuracy and diagnostics, and a connected pulse controller for dust collectors that enables real-time performance monitoring.
